name: Pacbase: Avoid Online Programs with too many Lines of Code in Screen Definition (-CE)
description: Large programs are more difficult to read and manage. The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
output: Nb of online programs with more than X LOC in screen definition`!xA!`Value : Nb of LOC in screen definition (-CE)
rationale: Large programs are more difficult to read and manage. The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
